overview: It's all about a cheating housewife, a nosy neighbor, and a woman named Madame Rona, who's really a man! Confused? Well, add to this recipe an insatiable shutterbug who gets it on with his models, an over-sexed secretary who takes dick-tation, and a philandering magazine mogul, and you have the makings of the hottest whodunit of the year!
tagline: It's the Case of the Buried Bone!
title: Goin' Down Slow
